summary: Changes the message \"You are carrying too much to be able to run.\" when encumbered to \"You are encumbered\" out of respect for the long-standing RPG tradition of using the word encumbered to refer to a character who is carrying too much gear to be able to move at utmost efficiency.
descriptionHtml:
_____________________________________

This mod changes the message [b]\"You are carrying too much to be able to run.\"[/b] when encumbered to [b]\"You are encumbered.\"[/b], out of respect for the long-standing RPG tradition of using the word \"encumbrance\" to refer the weight of one\'s character\'s gear, and \"encumbered\" to refer to a character who is carrying too much gear to be able to move at utmost efficiency. 

_____________________________________

Change Log:
[list]
[*]2.0 - Changed \"You cannot fast travel while overencumbered.\" message to \"You cannot fast travel while encumbered.\"[/*]
[/list]
_____________________________________

Created with the [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Tes5Mod:SkyEdit]SkyEdit[/url] modding tool.
[line]
author: BigMill
